attributes.action: grant Oliver Postgate and Peter Firmin knighthoods for services to Childrens tv - bagpuss for example and the Clangers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oliver Postgate and Peter Firmin have both contributed to some of the best childrens Television ever created such as Bagpuss, the Clangers, Ivor the Engine. All these programmes are recognised as quality an educational programmes that have influenced a generation. My child has also been bought up with these programmes and they still continue to entertain children of all ages. They are a bench mark to which programmes for under 5's will always be compared. Yet their contribution continues not to be recognised.
